ai_business_context: Fresh Mart is a grocery store with produce, dairy, checkout lanes, and customer restrooms. Shoppers submit feedback about spills, equipment issues (refrigeration, doors, carts), cleanliness, safety hazards, and suggestions for products or service improvements.
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories. When unsure, use `other` and add a short note to internal context.

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: spill, leak, puddle, wet floor, mop, slippery
issue_categories.description: Spills, leaks, and wet-floor conditions needing cleanup.
issue_categories.label: Spills & Leaks

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: dirty, sticky, smell, trash, overflowing, grime, sanitize, mold
issue_categories.description: General cleanliness concerns (floors, surfaces, trash, odors).
issue_categories.label: Cleanliness

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: broken, not working, malfunction, cooler, freezer, refrigeration, temperature, door, handle, cart, wheel, scanner, register
issue_categories.description: Equipment and fixture problems (refrigeration, doors, carts, checkout equipment).
issue_categories.label: Equipment & Maintenance

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: hazard, unsafe, trip, fall, sharp, glass, obstruction, blocked, caution
issue_categories.description: Safety hazards (trip/fall risks, obstructions, broken glass).
issue_categories.label: Safety Hazard

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: out of stock, empty, missing, restock, expired, rotten, bruised, quality, fresh
issue_categories.description: Product availability and quality issues (stock, freshness, expired items).
issue_categories.label: Product Stock & Quality

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: line, wait, slow, cashier, self-checkout, service desk, rude, helpful, training
issue_categories.description: Customer service and checkout experience issues.
issue_categories.label: Service & Checkout

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: suggest, request, carry, add, bring back, hours, signage, improve
issue_categories.description: Suggestions for products, layout, signage, or service improvements.
issue_categories.label: Suggestion

issue_categories.description: Other/unclear issues. Use sparingly; add a short note in internal context when possible.
issue_categories.label: Other

comments.body: Thanks for flagging—team is on the way with wet-floor signs.

issues.description: Water pooling near the cart corral entrance area; floor is slippery and needs immediate cleanup and signage.

reports.body: There’s a puddle right by the cart return—almost slipped.
Wet floor near the carts. No cone/sign when I walked in.
Looks like it’s dripping from somewhere above the cart corral area.

issues.title: Slippery puddle by cart corral

updates.message: Wet-floor signs placed and area mopped; investigating possible drip source near entrance.
Drip traced to condensation line; maintenance adjusted and monitored—no further pooling observed.

issues.description: The vestibule automatic door hesitates and sometimes doesn’t open fully, causing a bottleneck and potential accessibility issue.

reports.body: The outer door stuttered and only opened halfway when I walked in.
Door sensor seems off—had to wave my hand to get it to open.

issues.title: Vestibule door not opening reliably

updates.message: Maintenance notified; sensor alignment and safety beam scheduled for service.

issues.description: Multiple berry clamshells had visible mold and leaking juice on the display; needs culling and wipe-down.

reports.body: Saw several moldy strawberries on the front of the berries display.
Raspberries were leaking and sticky on the shelf—looks like it’s been there a while.
Please check dates/quality on the berries—lots of soft ones today.

issues.title: Moldy berries on display

updates.message: Produce team culled affected product and sanitized the berries display; added mid-day quality check.

issues.description: Milk residue and a small puddle in front of the dairy wall cooler; floor is slick and smells sour.

reports.body: There’s spilled milk in front of the dairy cooler—very slippery.
Smells like sour milk near the dairy wall. Needs a mop ASAP.

issues.title: Spilled milk in front of dairy cooler

updates.message: Team alerted to clean spill and place wet-floor signage.

comments.body: If you notice any specific door number/section, please share—helps us pinpoint the gasket.

issues.description: One section of the dairy wall cooler feels warmer than the rest; condensation on the door and items not as cold.

reports.body: The right-side dairy cooler door area feels warm and foggy.
Yogurt cups weren’t cold in one spot of the dairy wall.
Lots of condensation on a dairy door—might not be sealing.

issues.title: Dairy wall cooler running warm in one section

updates.message: Temperature check logged; maintenance inspecting door gasket and airflow.
Temporary product move completed from warm zone; service call placed for cooler section.

issues.description: Yogurt section shelves have dried spills and sticky residue; looks like it hasn’t been wiped down recently.

reports.body: Yogurt shelves are sticky with old spills—hands got gross grabbing items.
There’s dried yogurt on the shelf edges in the yogurt section.

issues.title: Sticky shelves in yogurt section

updates.message: Shelves wiped and sanitized; added to nightly detail checklist.

issues.description: Freezer aisle door handle is loose and hard to pull; could break or pinch fingers.

reports.body: One freezer door handle is wobbly and feels like it will come off.
Handle on a freezer door is loose—hard to open with gloves.

issues.title: Loose handle on freezer door

updates.message: Work order submitted to tighten/replace handle hardware; door tagged for monitoring.

issues.description: Aisle 2 endcap has boxes protruding into the walkway; creates a trip hazard and blocks carts.

reports.body: Endcap display in aisle 2 sticks out—my cart clipped it.
Boxes on the endcap are in the aisle and people are squeezing by.

issues.title: Endcap boxes blocking aisle

updates.message: Display reset to within footprint; excess cases moved to backstock.

issues.description: Cereal aisle endcap is frequently empty by afternoon; shoppers requesting better restock timing.

reports.body: Cereal endcap was totally empty again around 5pm.
Seems like the promo cereal runs out every day—can you restock later in the day too?

issues.title: Cereal endcap often empty

updates.message: Replenishment adjusted: added mid-afternoon pull for Aisle 5 endcap during promotion.

comments.body: We’re reviewing staffing coverage for peak hours—thanks for the detail.

issues.description: Self-checkout area had multiple stations closed and one attendant; line backed up and customers needed help with age verification.

reports.body: Only a few self-checkouts were open and the line was long.
Waited for the attendant for an age check—took several minutes.
Two machines had ‘card only’ signs and another was out of order.

issues.title: Long line at self-checkout

updates.message: Front-end lead notified; checking machine status and adjusting coverage for evening rush.

issues.description: Lane 3 card reader intermittently fails and forces customers to retry or move lanes.

reports.body: Card reader at lane 3 declined twice then worked on the third try.
Lane 3 terminal froze during tap-to-pay and cashier had to reboot.

issues.title: Lane 3 card reader glitches

updates.message: Payment terminal firmware updated and cables reseated; monitored for repeat errors.

issues.description: Service desk area has overflowing trash and dusty brochure holders; looks cluttered and unclean.

reports.body: Trash can by customer service was overflowing with receipts.
The counter area had dust and old flyers everywhere.

issues.title: Overflowing trash at service desk

updates.message: Trash removed and area wiped down; added mid-shift check for customer service zone.

issues.description: Restroom hallway has a lingering odor and the floor looks like it needs a mop; paper scraps on the ground.

reports.body: Restroom hallway smells bad and there’s paper on the floor.
Floor in the hallway to the bathrooms looked dirty/streaky.

issues.title: Odor and litter in restroom hallway

updates.message: Janitorial notified for hallway mop and deodorizer; added check during peak hours.

comments.body: We’re increasing restroom checks on weekends—appreciate the report.

issues.description: Women’s restroom had empty soap dispenser and paper towels running low; sink area messy.

reports.body: No soap in the women’s restroom dispenser.
Paper towels were almost out and the counter was wet/dirty.

issues.title: Women’s restroom out of soap

updates.message: Soap refilled and paper towels restocked; sink area cleaned.

issues.description: Cracked floor tile near the main checkout area; uneven edge could catch carts or cause a trip.

reports.body: There’s a cracked/raised tile near checkout—almost tripped.

issues.title: Cracked tile near checkout

issues.description: Request to add clearer signage for gluten-free items and group them more consistently in grocery aisles.

reports.body: Could you add a gluten-free section or at least better shelf tags? Hard to find items.
Would love clearer signage for gluten-free products across aisles.

issues.title: Add clearer gluten-free signage

updates.message: Suggestion shared with merchandising; evaluating shelf-tag program for dietary attributes.

issues.description: Bakery area has crumbs and sticky spots near the tongs/bag station; needs wipe-down and more frequent sweeping.

reports.body: The counter by the bakery bags/tongs is sticky and has crumbs everywhere.
Bakery self-serve area looked messy—crumbs on the floor too.

issues.title: Messy bakery bag/tongs station

updates.message: Bakery team reminded to wipe station hourly; added sweep to mid-shift routine.

issues.description: Several carts have squeaky wheels and one cart has a sticking wheel that pulls to the side.

reports.body: Cart wheels are really squeaky and one cart kept veering left.
Please service the carts—some are hard to push and wobble.
Found a cart with a stuck wheel near the entrance cart area.

issues.title: Carts with squeaky/sticking wheels

updates.message: Problem carts pulled from service; wheels lubricated and two carts sent for repair.
